aws_key_id.title: Key ID
aws_key_id.description: AWS CloudTrail Access Key ID. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.

aws_secret_key.title: Secret Key
aws_secret_key.description: AWS CloudTrail Access Key ID. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.

aws_region_name.title: Region Name
aws_region_name.description: The default AWS Region to use, for example, us-west-1 or us-west-2. When specifying a Region inline during client initialization, this property is named region_name.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date you would like to replicate data. Data in AWS CloudTrail is available for last 90 days only. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.
